title: 3 and Out - More Kyler Drama, Rodgers $50 Million Demand, Inside Combine Week, Headlines, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - More Kyler Drama, Rodgers $50 Million Demand, Inside Combine Week, Headlines, Mailbag
description:
John explains why Kyler Murray's latest agent letter demanding a long-term extension is another red flag, why Aaron Rodgers $50 million per year demand will guarantee he never wins another Super Bowl, and what NFL combine week is like for front offices. He also runs down some of the top headlines around the league, including Sean McVay turning down a reported $100 million deal from Amazon, if Kirk Herbstreit should take his talents to the NFL broadcast booth, potential OT rule changes, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
